name: Budget Cuts
description: <h3>ABOUT THE GAME</h3><br/>You are an employee at mega conglomerate TransCorp to stamp papers and file files! Unfortunately TransCorp is an expert in the business of manufacturing cost-cutting robots, and soon your job will be in danger. <br/><br/>As another one of your coworkers is being dragged off to the terrifying HR department, a mysterious package arrives at your cubicle. <strong>Will you be able to save your job?</strong><br/><br/><br/>PLEASE NOTE! We would NOT suggest that younger children play this game.<h3>MAIN FEATURES</h3><br/><ul><li>Unleash your inner office spy ninja skills<br/></li><li>Thrilling, oil-splatter filled close quarter combat<br/></li><li>Dexterously zip, sneak or rambo your way forward<br/></li><li>Built for room-scale virtual reality from day one</li></ul><br/><br/><br/>"‘Budget Cuts’ Showcases an Impressive Grip on What Makes VR Great"<br/>RoadtoVR<br/><br/>"Budget Cuts is the future of VR right freakin' now"<br/>Eurogamer<br/><br/>“It's a rush that I might never have experienced in a game before.”<br/>Polygon<br/><br/>“Budget Cuts reminds me of classic Valve single-player games. That’s a very, very exciting thing.”<br/>Kotaku<br/><br/>“I can’t wait to play more of Budget Cuts, which might be the best, most interesting VR game I’ve played.”<br/>IGN<br/><br/>"Virtual Reality Sneak ‘Em Up Budget Cuts Looks Ace"<br/>RPS<br/><br/><br/> Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
